text: Denman (17 April 2000 â€“ 5 June 2018) was an Irish-bred National Hunt racehorse sired by Presenting. He was known as The Tank, Denman was widely known for his great rivalry with Kauto Star for the Cheltenham Gold Cup. This large horse with a front-running style won the Cheltenham Gold Cup in 2008. Denman was euthanized at Paul Nicholls' Ditcheat stables on 5 June 2018, aged 18. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths by euthanasia Category:Thoroughbred racehorses
title: Denman (horse)
